General.Name: DAP Corporation
General.Description: DAP Corporation provides printed circuit boards South Korea and internationally. Its products are used in mobile phones, tablet PCs, wearables, and automobiles. The company also provides construction equipment, such as CNC drill, laser drill, router, oxide, lay-up, hot press, desmear, chemical plating, electrolytic plating, exposure, etching, AOI, photo solder resist, electroness nikel immersion gold, and organic solderability preservatives. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
